text: haj ke maheene jaane-pahachaane aur nishchit hain, to jo inamen haj karane ka nishchay kare, ko haj mein na to kaam-vaasana kee baaten ho sakatee hai aur na avagya aur na ladaee-jhagade kee koee baat. aur jo bhalaee ke kaam bhee tum karonge allaah use jaanata hoga. aur (eesh-bhay) paathey le lo, kyonki sabase uttam paathey eesh-bhay hai. aur ai buddhi aur samajhavaalo! mera dar rakho
